We are building such models using machine-learning algorithms ensuring increasing accuracy.  By offering accurate toxicity related information throughout R&D, ViridisChem will lead the standardization of toxicity evaluation across all industries Our Solution: We have built the most comprehensive toxicity database with over 90 million chemicals and 2.4 billion properties, curated using AI techniques, and are offering through yearly subscription, an AI powered SaaS software platform that provides toxicity evaluation (related to ecological, health and safety) of any chemical, even the new molecules, identifies local, regional, and per country regulatory issues and established thresholds related to the chemical use, allowing scientists to eliminate high-risk drug candidates.
